titleStmt.title: The complaint of Christmas, and the teares of Twelfetyde by Iohn Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iames Boler, dwelling at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Includes: A Christmas carroll, to the tune of Poore Tom.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard
